item.title: Teleports in a list
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

DialogueHandler.java:

case 50: sendOption5("Option 1", "Option 2", "Option 3", "Option 4", "Option 5"); c.dialogueAction = 50; break;

ClickingButtons.java:
The button ids for 5 options are 9190, 9191, 9192, 9193, and 9194.

if (c.dialogueAction == 50) { //action goes here }

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports in a list
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“I Love College, post:1, topic:486559”]Hey guys, I need a little help on how you make teleports when you click on the button, show up in your chat box as a list, like when you click Minigames, it will pop up in your chat box in a list with the different minigames you can choose. As of right now, they show up in the inventory which i think just looks ugly.

I’m trying to change this code: case 6005: c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight Caves", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); c.interfaceGame = 2; break;

Into Something like this: http://prntscr.com/sw7wu[/quote]why not use the choice method?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports in a list
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

Hey guys, I need a little help on how you make teleports when you click on the button, show up in your chat box as a list, like when you click Minigames, it will pop up in your chat box in a list with the different minigames you can choose. As of right now, they show up in the inventory which i think just looks ugly.

I’m trying to change this code: case 6005: c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight Caves", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); c.interfaceGame = 2; break;

Into Something like this: http://prntscr.com/sw7wu

Read full topic
